details.description: Cancel your practical driving or riding test if you no longer need your appointment - give 3 working days' notice to get a refund
details.more_information:
You’ll need 2 of the following:

  • Great Britain or Northern Ireland driving licence number
  • application reference number
  • theory test pass certificate number

You can find your theory test pass certificate number online if you have lost your original letter.

You’ll get a full refund if you give at least 3 clear working days’ notice. Sundays and public holidays don’t count as working days.

Help with your booking

Call DSA if you have any problems cancelling your driving test online.

DSA booking support
Telephone: 0300 200 11 22
Textphone: 0300 200 11 44
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

Data protection

You can read the Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) before you start.
details.introduction: Cancel your practical driving or riding test if you no longer need your appointment. You can do it online between 6am and 11:40pm.

tags.title: Driving tests, motorcycle tests and learning to drive

details.description: Booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees, compulsory basic training

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
